about_the_game: Battle strategically in this 2.5D action adventure rogue-lite platformer against the manifestations of the seven deadly sins. Choose your upgrades carefully. In order to succeed you'll need to defeat the sins as well as their leader. The sins will change their availability each time the timeline is reset, but the one constant is the timer on the bomb's they've laid throughout the city and it's outskirts. Which way - which upgrades to take - use the clues from the opening and transitionary levels to determine which sin you'll do battle against and plan accordingly. Don't worry, your AI ship has your back with the ability to purchase permanent upgrades which carry over from play-through to play-through.

short_description: Prepare to reclaim the overtaken earth from manifestations of the seven deadly sins and their ominous leader. Choose your upgrades and paths' carefully - with the assistance of your AI ship you can reset the timeline and fight once again until you stop the sins in their tracks.
